title: HMCL按下加载游戏后,游戏直接崩溃
author: 8Mi丶以勒
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Tollainmear 于 2020-5-3 12:27 编辑 

问题描述:客户端json内额外安装了LiteLoader(1.9.4)和Optifine(1.9.4_E7)，\Mods文件夹以及\Mods\1.9.4总共有 “[Mod版1.9以上]AudioBuffer-1.0.jar”，“XRay-58.jar”，“mod-litemodwdl-4.0.4.0-mc1.09.4.litemod”.
个人看法:因为没安装Forge, “[Mod版1.9以上]AudioBuffer-1.0.jar”这个Mod不会被加载
HMCL弹出来的错误内容 来源于\logs\latest.log:
[01:25:48] [main/INFO]: Loading tweak class name com.mumfrey.liteloader.launch.LiteLoaderTweaker
[01:25:48] [main/INFO]: Using primary tweak class name com.mumfrey.liteloader.launch.LiteLoaderTweaker
[01:25:48] [main/INFO]: Loading tweak class name optifine.OptiFineForgeTweaker
[01:25:48] [main/INFO]: Calling tweak class com.mumfrey.liteloader.launch.LiteLoaderTweaker
[01:25:48] [main/INFO]: Bootstrapping LiteLoader 1.9.4
[01:25:48] [main/INFO]: Registering API provider class com.mumfrey.liteloader.client.api.LiteLoaderCoreAPIClient
[01:25:48] [main/INFO]: Spawning API provider class 'com.mumfrey.liteloader.client.api.LiteLoaderCoreAPIClient' ...
[01:25:48] [main/INFO]: API provider class 'com.mumfrey.liteloader.client.api.LiteLoaderCoreAPIClient' provides API 'liteloader'
[01:25:48] [main/INFO]: Initialising API 'liteloader' ...
[01:25:48] [main/ERROR]: Error during LiteLoader PREINIT: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError org/spongepowered/asm/launch/MixinBootstrap
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/spongepowered/asm/launch/MixinBootstrap
        at com.mumfrey.liteloader.launch.LiteLoaderTweaker.onPreInit(LiteLoaderTweaker.java:348) [liteloader-1.9.4.jar:1.9.4+unknown-b0.git-unknown]
        at com.mumfrey.liteloader.launch.LiteLoaderTweaker.acceptOptions(LiteLoaderTweaker.java:252) [liteloader-1.9.4.jar:1.9.4+unknown-b0.git-unknown]
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:114) [launchwrapper-1.12.jar:?]

Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.spongepowered.asm.launch.MixinBootstrap

java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.mumfrey.liteloader.client.transformers.CrashReportTransformer

复制代码求助,如何解决这种奇怪的问题


自行解决
HMCL在此事件后的后续版本中已修复该问题

replies.author: sistwier
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: Mike_Play_OK
replies.txt_content:
在官网下载LiteLoader的安装器
http://dl.liteloader.com/redist/ ... taller-1.9.4-00.exe
